item.title: Two Of Us
item.description:
vocal: Jotinha
Getting stronger, Baby, tell the driver Next stop we're gonna go I belong till we hear that final drum That is all I should know Getting strong Two of us It's like there's no tomorrow Two of us Going down in a line Two of us Makes us all get to think about love

item.title: Keep Shinning
item.description:
vocal: Rosana Galli
When I met you I knew that you were one of a kind Just somebody I know that you can talk anytime< I got some flowers I'll put the in my hair Let's stay together and we'll go anywhere
Hey, Hey Baby let your light shine on Hey, hey, Keep shinning

item.title: Walking In The Sunshine
item.description:
vocal: Diego Guimarães
Walking in the sunshine I've got a little something in my mind All of a sudden, I felt a chill "boy, you've better check out that behind" I wanna take her away with me On the walk about So I can sort it out The situation: infatuation There are many stars, but this can't be
(...)
(rap) Hey, hey! Olha o balance A mais bela de todas é você Esculturalmente perfeita Eleita a rainha da TV Hey,hey! Perco o rebolado, eu deixo o ato solene pra você Sou formado em imonologia, samba e poesia Hey, hey!

(...)
(rap) Hey, hey! Olha o balance A mais bela de todas é você Esculturalmente perfeita Eleita a rainha da TV Hey,hey! Perco o rebolado, eu deixo o ato solene pra você Sou formado em imonologia, samba e poesia Hey, hey!

item.title: Is This Love
item.description:
vocal: Vanessa Trielli
I wanna love you and treat you right I wanna love you every day and every night We'll be together with a roof right over our heads We'll share the shelter of my single bed We'll share the same room So, Jah provide the bread
Is this love, is this love, is this love Is this love that I'm feeling? Is this love, is this love, is this love Is this love that I'm feeling?
I wanna know, wanna know, wanna know now Oh yes I know, oh yes I know, oh yes I know I, I, I, I, I, I, I, I, I, I'm willing and able so I throw my cards on your table
I wanna love you, I wanna love and treat, love and treat you right I wanna love you every day and every night We'll be together, with a roof right over our heads We'll share the shelter, of my single bed We'll share the same room, So jah provide the bread
Is this love, is this love, is this love Is this love that I'm feeling? Is this love, love, love that I'm feeling?

vocal: Vanessa Trielli
I wanna love you and treat you right I wanna love you every day and every night We'll be together with a roof right over our heads We'll share the shelter of my single bed We'll share the same room So, Jah provide the bread
Is this love, is this love, is this love Is this love that I'm feeling? Is this love, is this love, is this love Is this love that I'm feeling?
I wanna know, wanna know, wanna know now Oh yes I know, oh yes I know, oh yes I know I, I, I, I, I, I, I, I, I, I'm willing and able so I throw my cards on your table
I wanna love you, I wanna love and treat, love and treat you right I wanna love you every day and every night We'll be together, with a roof right over our heads We'll share the shelter, of my single bed We'll share the same room, So jah provide the bread
Is this love, is this love, is this love Is this love that I'm feeling? Is this love, love, love that I'm feeling?

item.title: Love Will Keep Us Together
item.description:
vocal: Vanessa Trielli
Love, love will keep us together Think of me baby whatever Cause a sweet takking girl comes along, singing a song Don´t mess around you just gotta be strong
Just stop cause I really love you Stop i've been thinking of you Look in my heart and let love keep us together
You, you belong to me now Ain't gonna set you free now When those girls start hanging around, talking me down Hear with your heart and you won't hear a sound
Just stop … cause I really love you Stop, I’ll be thinking of you Look in my heart and let love keep us together….. whatever (whatever)
item.dc:creator: Os ImprovÃ¡veis
item.itunes:summary:
vocal: Vanessa Trielli
Love, love will keep us together Think of me baby whatever Cause a sweet takking girl comes along, singing a song Don´t mess around you just gotta be strong
Just stop cause I really love you Stop i've been thinking of you Look in my heart and let love keep us together
You, you belong to me now Ain't gonna set you free now When those girls start hanging around, talking me down Hear with your heart and you won't hear a sound
Just stop … cause I really love you Stop, I’ll be thinking of you Look in my heart and let love keep us together….. whatever (whatever)

item.title: Life
item.description:
vocal: Rosana Galli

Life can be just as fine
As your best wish
You'll find
The reality in you

It's just a matter of time
You'll know what you've gotta do
item.dc:creator: Os ImprovÃ¡veis
item.itunes:summary:
vocal: Rosana Galli Life can be just as fine As your best wish You'll find The reality in you
It's just a matter of time You'll know what you've gotta do

item.title: Without Name
item.description:
vocal: Diego Guimarães

Everytime I do the same
But I don't want to spend my life in vain
Will you appear to shed some light
It seems I always do the same

I'll never be

Without style, without taste
Without dough, without name
item.dc:creator: Os ImprovÃ¡veis
item.itunes:summary:
vocal: Diego Guimarães Everytime I do the same But I don't want to spend my life in vain Will you appear to shed some light It seems I always do the same
I'll never be
Without style, without taste Without dough, without name

item.title: Hot Dog
item.description:
vocal: Filipe Trielli

I was only sitting watchin
Til you showed up
And made me feel
Like a stray dog
And nobody knows your way

Sometimes It all seems to fall in place
It's alright, It;s so good to know that
Sometimes it all seems to fall in place
I'ts all right now
item.dc:creator: Os ImprovÃ¡veis
item.itunes:summary:
vocal: Filipe Trielli I was only sitting watchin Til you showed up And made me feel Like a stray dog And nobody knows your way
Sometimes It all seems to fall in place It's alright, It;s so good to know that Sometimes it all seems to fall in place I'ts all right now

item.title: Cookie Jar
item.description:
vocal: Diego Guimarães

I asked my momma
Where is the cookie jar?
She said your too fat
And you'll never get far

He asked his momma
Where is the cookie jar?
She said Hey boy
Why don't you take a hike

Bad momma give us the cookie jar
Bad momma, bad momma
We want the cookie jar
item.dc:creator: Os ImprovÃ¡veis
item.itunes:summary:
vocal: Diego Guimarães I asked my momma Where is the cookie jar? She said your too fat And you'll never get far
He asked his momma Where is the cookie jar? She said Hey boy Why don't you take a hike
Bad momma give us the cookie jar Bad momma, bad momma We want the cookie jar

item.title: Close To You
item.description:
vocal: Rosana Galli

Why do birds suddenly appear?
Everytime you are near
Just like me they long to be
Close to you

Why do stars fall down from the sky?
Everytime you walk by
Just like me they long to be
Close to you

On the day that you were born
The angels got together and decided
To create a dream come true
So they sprinkled moondust in your hair
Of gold and starlight in your eyes of blue

That is why all the girls in the town
Follow you all around
Just like me they long to be
Close to you

Just like me they long to be
Close to you

Woaa... Close to you...
item.dc:creator: Os ImprovÃ¡veis
item.itunes:summary:
vocal: Rosana Galli
Why do birds suddenly appear? Everytime you are near Just like me they long to be Close to you
Why do stars fall down from the sky? Everytime you walk by Just like me they long to be Close to you
On the day that you were born The angels got together and decided To create a dream come true So they sprinkled moondust in your hair Of gold and starlight in your eyes of blue
That is why all the girls in the town Follow you all around Just like me they long to be Close to you
Just like me they long to be Close to you
Woaa... Close to you...

item.title: Intimidade
item.description:
vocal: Filipe Trielli e Naye

Ninguém conhece aquela tatuagem colorida
Escondida no seu corpo
Que só eu sei de cor
Quem vai te colocar num pedestal
Tão alto e claro, e limpo, e livre que você merece estar

Já te conheço a tanto tempo
E o tempo pára quando a gente se vê
Sou eu que te entendo e te defendo
E vou vivendo sempre junto de você

Ninguém acaria todo dia a sua pele tão macia
Como eu sempre fiz

É impossível imaginar alguém
Que possa te abraçar no meu lugar
E te fazer feliz

Já te conheço a tanto tempo
E o tempo pára quando a gente se vê
Sou eu que te aceito e te respeito
E vou vivendo sempre junto de você

É que eu respeito esse teu jeito diferente
Inteiramente pessoal afinal,
Você é você
Eu adivinho seus anseios, seios, pernas, calcanhares
Todos os lugares do seu ser

Já te conheço a tanto tempo
O tempo pára quando a gente se vê
Sou eu que te entendo
Sou eu que te defendo
Sou eu que te abraço e me desfaço
E vou vivendo sempre junto de você
item.dc:creator: Os ImprovÃ¡veis
item.itunes:summary:
vocal: Filipe Trielli e Naye
Ninguém conhece aquela tatuagem colorida Escondida no seu corpo Que só eu sei de cor Quem vai te colocar num pedestal Tão alto e claro, e limpo, e livre que você merece estar
Já te conheço a tanto tempo E o tempo pára quando a gente se vê Sou eu que te entendo e te defendo E vou vivendo sempre junto de você
Ninguém acaria todo dia a sua pele tão macia Como eu sempre fiz
É impossível imaginar alguém Que possa te abraçar no meu lugar E te fazer feliz
Já te conheço a tanto tempo E o tempo pára quando a gente se vê Sou eu que te aceito e te respeito E vou vivendo sempre junto de você
É que eu respeito esse teu jeito diferente Inteiramente pessoal afinal, Você é você Eu adivinho seus anseios, seios, pernas, calcanhares Todos os lugares do seu ser
Já te conheço a tanto tempo O tempo pára quando a gente se vê Sou eu que te entendo Sou eu que te defendo Sou eu que te abraço e me desfaço E vou vivendo sempre junto de você

item.title: Sobre Nós
item.description:
vocal: Filipe Trielli

O Teto cobrindo o jantar
Um guarda-chuva cobrindo um par
A mãe cobrindo os irmãos
A mão cobrindo outra mão
A lua sobre os namorados
Arroz sobre os recém-casados
A noite que cobre o beijo
O lençol que cobre o desejo

E sobre nós
O céu unindo mundo sobre nós
E sobre nós
Uma canção sobre nós

O sol cobrindo a multidão
A bandeira do time cobrindo a paixão
O céu sobre as nações
Sobre as estrelas canções

E sobre nós
O céu unindo mundo sobre nós
E sobre nós
Uma canção sobre nós

E sobre nós O céu unindo mundo sobre nós E sobre nós Uma canção sobre nós
